summary: A Replacer for Most Permanent and Temporary follower Hair in Skyrim and the Dawnguard Expansion
descriptionHtml:
[heading][center]Alternative Follower Hair[/center][/heading]

[center]This is a simple mod I cooked up earlier. It simply replaces the hair of most of the permanent and temporary followers with hairs from Apachii Skyhair.

As such, the original Apachii Skyhair mod will be required.[/center]

[center]Required Files:

Apachii Skyhair v1.5 Full 

Apachii Skyhair Female v1.1.a

Apachii Skyhair Male v1.0[/center]


[center]This mod only modifies NPC Hair. Any differences in facial appearance are caused by other mods I\'m currently using.[/center]


[center]I recommend placing this mod after anything that directly affects Followers, such as any Follower Tweaks (AFT/UFO/Etc.)[/center]


[center]I got a bit lazy tracking down followers, so expect more images to come later.
[/center]


[center]Excluded NPCs:

Stenvar

Serana

Kharjo

Lob

Derkeethus

Esbern

Sinding

Vidrald[/center]


Resources:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
author: HikoTanzaki
